verses.verse: Then<WG5119> spake<WG2980> Jesus<WG2424> to the multitude<WG3793>, and<WG2532> to his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>,

All <WG3956> therefore <WG3767> whatsoever <WG302><WG3745> they bid <WG2036> you <WG5213> observe <WG5083> , that observe <WG5083> and <WG2532> do <WG4160> ; but <WG1161> do <WG4160> not <WG3361> ye after <WG2596> their <WG846> works <WG2041> : for <WG1063> they say <WG3004> , and <WG2532> do <WG4160> not <WG3756> .

For <WG1063> they bind <WG1195> heavy <WG926> burdens <WG5413> and <WG2532> grievous to be borne <WG1419> , and <WG2532> lay <WG2007> them on <WG1909> men's <WG444> shoulders <WG5606> ; but <WG1161> they themselves will <WG2309> not <WG3756> move <WG2795> them <WG846> with one of their <WG846> fingers <WG1147> .

But <WG1161> all <WG3956> their <WG846> works <WG2041> they do <WG4160> for <WG4314> to be seen <WG2300> of men <WG444><WG1161> : they make broad <WG4115> their <WG846> phylacteries <WG5440> , and <WG2532> enlarge <WG3170> the borders <WG2899> of their <WG846> garments <WG2440> ,
And <WG5037> love <WG5368> the uppermost rooms <WG4411> at <WG1722> feasts <WG1173> , and <WG2532> the chief seats <WG4410> in <WG1722> the synagogues <WG4864> ,
And <WG2532> greetings <WG783> in <WG1722> the markets <WG58> , and <WG2532> to be called <WG2564> of <WG5259> men <WG444> , Rabbi <WG4461> , Rabbi <WG4461> .

But <WG1161> be <WG2564> not <WG3361> ye <WG5210> called <WG2564> Rabbi <WG4461> : for <WG1063> one <WG1520> is <WG2076> your <WG5216> Master <WG2519> , even Christ <WG5547> ; and <WG1161> all <WG3956> ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> brethren <WG80> .

And <WG2532> call <WG2564> no <WG3361> man your <WG5216> father <WG3962> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093> : for <WG1063> one <WG1520> is <WG2076> your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> , which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> .
Neither <WG3366> be ye called <WG2564> masters <WG2519> : for <WG1063> one <WG1520> is <WG2076> your <WG5216> Master <WG2519> , even Christ <WG5547> .
But <WG1161> he that is greatest <WG3187> among you <WG5216> shall be <WG2071> your <WG5216> servant <WG1249> .
And <WG1161> whosoever <WG3748> shall exalt <WG5312> himself <WG1438> shall be abased <WG5013> ; and <WG2532> he <WG3748> that shall humble <WG5013> himself <WG1438> shall be exalted <WG5312> .

¶ But <WG1161> woe <WG3759> unto you <WG5213> , scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> Pharisees <WG5330> , hypocrites <WG5273> ! for <WG3754> ye shut up <WG2808> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> against <WG1715> men <WG444> : for <WG1063> ye <WG5210> neither <WG3761> go in <WG1525> yourselves , neither <WG3756> suffer ye <WG863> them that are entering <WG1525> to go in <WG1525> .

Woe <WG3759> unto you <WG5213> , scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> Pharisees <WG5330> , hypocrites <WG5273> ! for <WG3754> ye devour <WG2719> widows' <WG5503> houses <WG3614> , and <WG2532> for a pretence <WG4392> make <WG4336> long <WG3117> prayer <WG4336> : therefore <WG1223><WG5124> ye shall receive <WG2983> the greater <WG4055> damnation <WG2917> .

Woe <WG3759> unto you <WG5213> , scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> Pharisees <WG5330> , hypocrites <WG5273> ! for <WG3754> ye compass <WG4013> sea <WG2281> and <WG2532> land <WG3584> to make <WG4160> one <WG1520> proselyte <WG4339> , and <WG2532> when <WG3752> he is made <WG1096> , ye make <WG4160> him <WG846> twofold more <WG1362> the child <WG5207> of hell <WG1067> than yourselves <WG5216> .

Woe <WG3759> unto you <WG5213> , ye blind <WG5185> guides <WG3595> , which <WG3588> say <WG3004> , Whosoever <WG3739><WG302> shall swear <WG3660> by <WG1722> the temple <WG3485> , it is <WG2076> nothing <WG3762> ; but <WG1161> whosoever <WG3739><WG302> shall swear <WG3660> by <WG1722> the gold <WG5557> of the temple <WG3485> , he is a debtor <WG3784> !

Ye fools <WG3474> and <WG2532> blind <WG5185> : for <WG1063> whether <WG5101> is <WG2076> greater <WG3187> , the gold <WG5557> , or <WG2228> the temple <WG3485> that sanctifieth <WG37> the gold <WG5557> ?

And <WG2532> , Whosoever <WG3739><WG1437> shall swear <WG3660> by <WG1722> the altar <WG2379> , it is <WG2076> nothing <WG3762> ; but <WG1161> whosoever <WG3739><WG302> sweareth <WG3660> by <WG1722> the gift <WG1435> that is upon <WG1883> it <WG846> , he is guilty <WG3784> .
Ye fools <WG3474> and <WG2532> blind <WG5185> : for <WG1063> whether <WG5101> is greater <WG3187> , the gift <WG1435> , or <WG2228> the altar <WG2379> that sanctifieth <WG37> the gift <WG1435> ?
Whoso therefore <WG3767> shall swear <WG3660> by <WG1722> the altar <WG2379> , sweareth <WG3660> by <WG1722> it <WG846> , and <WG2532> by <WG1722> all things <WG3956> thereon <WG1883><WG846> .
And <WG2532> whoso shall swear <WG3660> by <WG1722> the temple <WG3485> , sweareth <WG3660> by <WG1722> it <WG846> , and <WG2532> by <WG1722> him that dwelleth <WG2730> therein <WG846> .

And <WG2532> he that shall swear <WG3660> by <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> , sweareth <WG3660> by <WG1722> the throne <WG2362> of God <WG2316> , and <WG2532> by <WG1722> him that sitteth <WG2521> thereon <WG1883><WG846> .

Woe <WG3759> unto you <WG5213> , scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> Pharisees <WG5330> , hypocrites <WG5273> ! for <WG3754> ye pay tithe <WG586> of mint <WG2238> and <WG2532> anise <WG432> and <WG2532> cummin <WG2951> , and <WG2532> have omitted <WG863> the weightier <WG926> matters of the law <WG3551> , judgment <WG2920><WG2532> , mercy <WG1656> , and <WG2532> faith <WG4102> : these <WG5023> ought ye <WG1163> to have done <WG4160> , and not <WG3361> to leave <WG863> the other <WG2548> undone <WG863> .
Ye blind <WG5185> guides <WG3595> , which strain at <WG1368> a gnat <WG2971> , and <WG1161> swallow <WG2666> a camel <WG2574> .

Woe <WG3759> unto you <WG5213> , scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> Pharisees <WG5330> , hypocrites <WG5273> ! for <WG3754> ye make clean <WG2511> the outside <WG1855> of the cup <WG4221> and <WG2532> of the platter <WG3953> , but <WG1161> within <WG2081> they are full <WG1073> of <WG1537> extortion <WG724> and <WG2532> excess <WG192> .

Thou blind <WG5185> Pharisee <WG5330> , cleanse <WG2511> first <WG4412> that which is within <WG1787> the cup <WG4221> and <WG2532> platter <WG3953> , that <WG2443> the outside <WG1622> of them <WG846> may be <WG1096> clean <WG2513> also <WG2532> .

Woe <WG3759> unto you <WG5213> , scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> Pharisees <WG5330> , hypocrites <WG5273> ! for <WG3754> ye are like <WG3945> unto whited <WG2867> sepulchres <WG5028> , which <WG3748> indeed <WG3303> appear <WG5316> beautiful <WG5611> outward <WG1855> , but <WG1161> are within <WG2081> full <WG1073> of dead <WG3498> men's bones <WG3747> , and <WG2532> of all <WG3956> uncleanness <WG167> .

Even so <WG3779> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532><WG3303> outwardly <WG1855> appear <WG5316> righteous <WG1342> unto men <WG444> , but <WG1161> within <WG2081> ye are <WG2075> full <WG3324> of hypocrisy <WG5272> and <WG2532> iniquity <WG458> .

Woe <WG3759> unto you <WG5213> , scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> Pharisees <WG5330> , hypocrites <WG5273> ! because <WG3754> ye build <WG3618> the tombs <WG5028> of the prophets <WG4396> , and <WG2532> garnish <WG2885> the sepulchres <WG3419> of the righteous <WG1342> ,

And <WG2532> say <WG3004> , If <WG1487> we had been <WG2258> in <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962> , we would <WG302> not <WG3756> have been <WG2258> partakers <WG2844> with them <WG846> in <WG1722> the blood <WG129> of the prophets <WG4396> .
Wherefore <WG5620> ye be witnesses <WG3140> unto yourselves <WG1438> , that <WG3754> ye are <WG2075> the children <WG5207> of them which killed <WG5407> the prophets <WG4396> .
Fill <WG4137> ye <WG5210> up <WG4137> then <WG2532> the measure <WG3358> of your <WG5216> fathers <WG3962> .
Ye serpents <WG3789> , ye generation <WG1081> of vipers <WG2191> , how <WG4459> can ye <WG5343> escape <WG575> the damnation <WG2920> of hell <WG1067> ?

¶ Wherefore <WG1223><WG5124> , behold <WG2400> , I <WG1473> send <WG649> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209> prophets <WG4396> , and <WG2532> wise men <WG4680> , and <WG2532> scribes <WG1122> : and <WG2532> some of <WG1537> them <WG846> ye shall kill <WG615> and <WG2532> crucify <WG4717> ; and <WG2532> some of <WG1537> them <WG846> shall ye scourge <WG3146> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> synagogues <WG4864> , and <WG2532> persecute <WG1377> them from <WG575> city <WG4172> to <WG1519> city <WG4172> :

That <WG3704> upon <WG1909> you <WG5209> may come <WG2064> all <WG3956> the righteous <WG1342> blood <WG129> shed <WG1632> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093> , from <WG575> the blood <WG129> of righteous <WG1342> Abel <WG6> unto <WG2193> the blood <WG129> of Zacharias <WG2197> son <WG5207> of Barachias <WG914> , whom <WG3739> ye slew <WG5407> between <WG3342> the temple <WG3485> and <WG2532> the altar <WG2379> .
Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213> , All <WG3956> these things <WG5023> shall come <WG2240> upon <WG1909> this <WG5026> generation <WG1074> .

O Jerusalem <WG2419> , Jerusalem <WG2419> , thou that killest <WG615> the prophets <WG4396> , and <WG2532> stonest <WG3036> them which are sent <WG649> unto <WG4314> thee <WG846> , how often <WG4212> would I <WG2309> have gathered <WG1996> thy <WG4675><WG3739> children <WG5043> together <WG1996> , even as <WG5158> a hen <WG3733> gathereth <WG1996> her <WG1438> chickens <WG3556> under <WG5259> her wings <WG4420> , and <WG2532> ye would <WG2309> not <WG3756> !
Behold <WG2400> , your <WG5216> house <WG3624> is left <WG863> unto you <WG5213> desolate <WG2048> .

For <WG1063> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213> , Ye shall <WG1492> not <WG3364> see <WG1492> me <WG3165> henceforth <WG575><WG737> , till <WG2193><WG302> ye shall say <WG2036> , Blessed <WG2127> is he that cometh <WG2064> in <WG1722> the name <WG3686> of the Lord <WG2962> .
